General.Name: Fujian Kuncai Material Tech
General.Description: Fujian Kuncai Material Technology Co., Ltd. develops and manufactures synthetic mica-based pigments in China and internationally. It offers pigments for applications in automotive coatings, plastics, cosmetics, printing ink, industrial coatings, consumer goods, seed coatings, paper coatings, ceramics and glass, composites, personal care products, and other industries. Fujian Kuncai Material Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Fuzhou, China.
